attributes.action:
LOOK UP & BOOK UP
Help entertainment industry similar to EAT OUT & HELP OUT
attributes.additional_details:
Because our arts and entertainment industries need light at the end of this dark tunnel. It will create immediate cash to stagnant box-offices and will give our industry a glimmer of hope and save jobs in this sector.

A schedule is suggested, moveable if needs be, and theatres can start booking shows etc once more with an instant revenue
attributes.background: Similar to The Government's Eat Out To Help Out, we suggest our theatres with cash flow issues book performances for, say, Spring 2021 with tickets on sale NOW with concessionary discounts that will be met by The Government, to help kick-start and industry that is struggling to survive.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334377
